message:
iOS 13 Developer Beta 1 was released today, and while Shortcuts had some very nice updates, some shortcuts became very broken. One of them is All-in-One Utilities.

Due to All-in-One Utilities’ massive size, it will definitely not be able to run smoothly on the new Shortcuts app. Currently on the new Shortcuts app, All-in-One Utilities has a 30% chance of freezing the app, 60% chance of lagging so badly the shortcut becomes unuseable and 10% chance you can even open an utility.

Right now, there are three options: 1. Rewrite All-in-One Utilities into a new shortcut | 2. Attempt to update All-in-One Utilities | 3. Abandon All-in-One Utilities

I really want to see what you guys think, so please go to the poll and tell me which option do you think would be the best.

To go to the poll page, press “Yes”. To ignore this message, press “No”
